name: Ancient Rivalry (Adrien Marchello)
description:
The legendary Dragon fights against the mighty Tigers one more time !
You play as Seiryū (a Chinese mythological dragon) and you have to fight against your old opponent, the white tiger, in a round arena. An army of mystical tiger will appear in the arena with different elements : fire, water, wind and thunder. You will have to collect and combine the power of some elemental gems (with a maximum of two gems at the same time) to beat them and survive as long as possible. Plus, you can collect the dead tiger's soul to uprgrade your shots and become more and more powerful. Try to beat your highscore in each games !

NOTE: The soundtracks come from the game Len'en by Trick Nostalgie (JynX).
We do not own nor claim to own the soundtracks from Len'en or any copyrighted material here, and will take this game down if any of the copyright owners request that we do so.

GGJ link - https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/ancient-rivalry-7
